content.new:
`BulletJoint::Detach()` does not call `Joint::Detach()` this leads to an inconsistency reported very frequently in the console which essentially breaks the simulation.

An example of the error message.
`[Err] [BulletJoint.cc:339] Joint [butter::joint_

issue.title: BulletJoint::Detach() does not call it's parent Detach()
